physDesc.p: Fragments 1-25 (in mm), (1) 5 x 27, (A) 1 line, right margin, (B) 1 line, no margins, (2) 25 x 36, (A) 2 lines, right margin, (B) 2 col., col. i: 1 line, right margin, col. ii: left margin, (3) 27 x 34, (A) 4 lines, left margin, (B) 3 lines, no margins, (4) 42 x 13, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) 6 lines, no margins, (5) 42 x 21, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, no margins, (6) 52 x 19, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) 7 lines, no margins, (7) 41 x 39, (A) 4 lines, left top margins, (B) 2 lines, top right margins, (8) 31 x 23, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (9) 34 x 17, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) 5 lines, no margins, (10) 32 x 16, (A) 6 lines, right margin, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (11) 32 x 21, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, no margins, (12) 28 x 13, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (13) 29 x 21, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, top (?) margin, (14) 28 x 31, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, no margins, (15) 32 x 20, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, no margins, (16) 16 x 18, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, no margins, (17) 26 x 12, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (18) 33 x 13, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, no margins, (19) 57 x 36, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 6 lines, no margins, (20) 50 x 32, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 9 lines, right margin, (21) 61 x 35, (A) 8 lines, right margin, (B) 7 lines, no margins, (22) 52 x 37, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) 4 lines, bottom margin, (23) 73 x 27, (A) 5 lines, right margin, (B) 6 lines, top margins, (24) 64 x 22, (A) 3 lines, left top margins, (B) 5 lines, top margin, (25) 53 x 28, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) 7 lines, bottom margin (?)
